parameters.description: filter data by a range of created data(ie. '2021-01-01T00:00:00.000Z,2021-01-02T23:59:59.999Z' means an range between 2021-01-01T00:00:00.000Z and 2021-01-02T23:59:59.999Z inclusive)
parameters.name: created_at

parameters.description: A URL parameter that specifies the maximum number of records to return. This can be any positive integer between 1 and 1000 inclusive. If not specified, the default is 20.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Specifies an offset that allows you to retrieve the next batch of records.Any positive integer.If not specified, the default is 0.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Specifies sequences to sort data (ie.orderby=id:desc)
parameters.name: orderby

delete.description:
only admin could use this method
all accounts would be logout if admin deleted them

parameters.name: body

only admin could use this method
all accounts would be logout if admin deactivated them

patch.description:
admin or member only could change self password
all accounts would be logout if one of users changed password
user must use password to login if he want to change his password

parameters.name: body

post.description: admin or member could only link self account
post.summary: link your account to third party service

parameters.description: post /users/link params
parameters.name: body

delete.description:
admin or member could only unlink self account
all accounts which linked with specific third party service would be logout if one of users unlinked
delete.summary: unlink your account from third party service

parameters.description: login type which you want to unlink
parameters.name: login_type

get.description:
admin could get specific or self user data
member could only get self user data
get.summary: get specific or self user data

parameters.description: specific user identifier or 'self' to get self user data
parameters.name: id

post.description:
only allow admin to use this method
only support ComplyAdvantage,Elliptic,Chainalysis for provider now
only support Blockchain Analytics,Sanction Screening for type now
post.summary: test if thirdparty service is available

parameters.description: post /vendors/test params
parameters.name: body

currency_id.description: Choose target currency identifier from GET /currencies

originator.description: Choose asset identifiers from GET /assets/:customerID or input addresses belong to above customer identifier

value.description: The value of the currency requested to transfer.

new_password.description:
new password must be follow below rules:
at least 6 letters
at least 1 number
at least 1 upper case
at least 1 special character

sanction_report_link.description: sanction_report_link would be valuable if sanction screening service is enabled, it provids a report to download

sanction_score.description: sanction_score would be valuable if sanction screening service is enabled

next_offset.description: next_offset is valuable when has_next is true

expire_date.description: Unix timestamp.To set an expiry date of your transfer request. Bridge will stop relaying transfer requests once the transfer expires.

id.description: Target transaction identifier which status is Pending On Beneficiary

permission_status.description: Status of the transfer permission, 0 for accept, 1 for reject

reject_code.description: Only required when the permission_status is REJECTED, reply with [BVRC](ref:beneficiary-vasp-rejected-code).

reject_message.description: Only required when the permission_status is REJECTED and reject_code is 'BVRC999', reply with [BVRC](ref:beneficiary-vasp-rejected-code).

id.description: Target transaction identifier which status is Pending On Originator

customer.description: cutomer is required if permission_status is ACCEPTED

expire_date.description: Unix timestamp.To set an expiry date of your transfer request. Bridge will stop relaying transfer requests once the transfer expires.

id.description: Target transaction identifier which status is Pending On Beneficiary

permission_status.description: Status of the transfer permission, 0 for accept, 1 for reject

reject_code.description: Only required when the permission_status is REJECTED, reply with [BVRC](ref:beneficiary-vasp-rejected-code).

reject_message.description: Only required when the permission_status is REJECTED and reject_code is 'BVRC999', reply with [BVRC](ref:beneficiary-vasp-rejected-code).

account.description: your account of third party service

credential.description: your credential of third party service and it would be used to validate if your account is valid

login_type.description:
third party service name
only google is supported now

account.description: account should be valid email address

email_pw_to_user.description: email_pw_to_user is optional and its default value is true.

password.description:
password is optional and it is generated if password is empty.
password must be follow below rules:
at least 6 letters
at least 1 number
at least 1 upper case
at least 1 special character

role_id.description:
role_id
* 0 - admin
* 1 - member
role_id is optional and its default value is 1(member).
notice: admin could not be created if there is admin in VASP.

credential.description:
credential
* provider:Elliptic,type:Blockchain Analytics - api_key and secret are required
* provider:Chainalysis,type:Blockchain Analytics - api_key is required
* provider:ComplyAdvantage,type:Sanction Screening - api_key is required

addrs.description: addresses which are searching information by Sygna Bridge and specific KYT service

currency_id.description: choose target currency identifier from GET /currencies

is_vasp.description: the address if is belong to a VASP

success.description: there is only error attribute if success is false;otherwise, there are another attributes

type.description: the address is belong to which type

primary_identifier.description:
primary_identifier is required and secondary_identifier is optional if customer_type is NaturalPerson ;
legal_person_name is required  if customer_type is LegalPerson
